headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pink Diamond Spotted on Cayo Perico CCTV
content:
The mainland doesn't have a monopoly on love, either: make your way to the sun-kissed isle of Cayo Perico and see if you can find a way in and out of El Rubio's fortified compound. Word on the wire is that the big boss-man's got his paws on a rosy Pink Diamond and stashed it. Keep an eye out for it on the villa's camera feeds.

It'll be worth a pretty penny, if you can escape with it (and your life) intact.
